channel.title: Npcs are multi but wont attack me?

item.title: Npcs are multi but wont attack me?
item.dc:creator: @lugmfr lugmfr
item.description:
@lugmfr wrote:

Yeah, I’ve added it there to. They just all come at me at once but don’t attack me. They even look like they’re attacking but your not in combat.

[code]public boolean isAggressive(int i) {
switch (npcs[i].npcType) {
case 6248: //minions
case 6250:
case 1958:
case 73:
case 6261:
case 6263:
case 125:

	case 6265:
	case 6204:
	case 6206:
	case 6208: // end minions
		case 6260:
		case 2551:
		case 2552:
			case 6223:
	case 6225:
	case 6227:
		case 2553:
		case 6222:
		case 2559:
		case 2560:
		case 50:
		case 2561:
		case 6247:
		case 2563:
		case 6203:
		case 2565:
		case 2892:
		case 2894:
		case 2881:
		case 2882:
		case 2883:
		return true;		
	}[/code]

item.title: Npcs are multi but wont attack me?
item.dc:creator: @lugmfr lugmfr
item.description:
@lugmfr wrote:

public boolean multiAttacks(int i) { switch (npcs[i].npcType) { case 6222: case 125:

case 125: ice warriors, I set them multi and they come at you like they’re going to attack you. They even hit, but it doesn’t do anything. Doesn’t even say your in combat.
